BlackNightmare:

"I don't know if I could live without him or stand watch him with 
other girl"said Blacknightmare trying to hold back her emotions

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Yojinbo of Nightmare" 
<bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> Hellplague:
> 
> The femme hugged her sister with a wary smile.
> "I doubt it will come to that.  He still very much cares for you, 
> his is a strong emotion, he will never forget you, even if he goes 
> back to them.  Don't worry about it."
> SHe didn't want to admit it, but she would miss Malice just as 
much 
> as Blacknightmare.  But she had to be the responsible one and take 
> care of it, this was too important to both of them.
